servinfo.title: CRUISE or SET indicator light does not turn ON or OFF

item.ptxt: Before performing this Cruise Control System Symptom Diagnosis, perform cruise control system check referring to Cruise Control System Check .
Check each part in the order from the top of the following list.

condition.ptxt: CRUISE or SET indicator light does not turn ON or OFF

action.ptxt: Check MAIN (ON/OFF) switch for function referring to Cruise Control Switch Inspection .
Check SET/COAST switch for function referring to Cruise Control Switch Inspection .
Check brake light switch for function referring to Brake Light Switch Inspection .
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.
